instructions: Wash and drain the lentils.
Chop the onion, and cut the carrot and potato into small cubes.
Heat the vegetable oil in a pot, add the chopped onion and sauté until golden.
Add the carrot and potato, sauté for a few more minutes.
Add the lentils and water, bring to a boil.
Once boiling, reduce the heat, cover the pot, and cook until the lentils are very soft.
Blend the soup, add salt and spices.
Serve with lemon juice.
servingSuggestion: Lentil soup can be served with fresh bread.

ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a pan, sauté the finely chopped onion and crushed garlic until soft.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Add the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
Simmer the sauce for 20-30 minutes until it thickens.
Serve with cooked spaghetti and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.
Enjoy your Spaghetti Bolognese!
servingSuggestion: Spaghetti Bolognese can be served with garlic bread or a green salad.

instructions: Peel the eggplants in stripes and fry them after making a slit in the middle.
Chop the onion and peppers, and cut the tomatoes into small cubes.
Heat the vegetable oil in a pan, add the chopped onion and sauté until golden.
Add the ground beef and continue to sauté.
Add the peppers and tomatoes, then stir in the tomato paste.
Add salt and black pepper, and cook the mixture with a little water.
Stuff the fried eggplants with the mixture and place them in a baking tray.
Add water and bake in a preheated oven at 180°C for 20 minutes.
servingSuggestion: Stuffed Eggplant can be served with rice and tzatziki.

instructions: Cut the eggplants into cubes and soak them in salted water.
Chop the peppers and grate the tomatoes.
Drain and dry the eggplants, then fry them.
Heat the olive oil in a pan, add the chopped peppers and sauté.
Add the grated tomatoes and cook.
Add the fried eggplants, salt, and black pepper.
Mix well and transfer to a serving dish.
servingSuggestion: Shakshuka can be served with yogurt on top.

instructions: Process the cherries.
